name: Planetary Defender
description: New from ConmerGameStudios and LPR Productions, comes this addicting shooter for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.  Defend Earth from multiple waves of enemies, each with its own unique properties.  There are 21 different types of enemies in all, including 5 bosses and the infamous “Megaboss” on the final level.  At your disposal are 5 different weapons.  This fast-paced game will keep you coming back for more.  Save the Earth today!
